entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Vita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
